p: Lavandulifolioside was known to have cardiotonic pharmacological effects. In some in vivo studies, lavandulifolioside isolated from Leonurus cardiaca was evidenced to have antiarrhythmic effect [ 51]. Lavandulifolioside and Isoacteoside isolated from Plantago lanceolata L. reportedly had antispasmodic activity by inhibiting contractions induced by acetylcholine in animal model [ 52].
